alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Galveston Island; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 02 at 8:29PM CDT until October 04 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding impacts are a possibility for a short time period around high tide times Tuesday evening. * WHERE...Gulf-facing beaches, including the Matagorda Peninsula, Brazoria County beaches, Galveston Island and the Bolivar Peninsula. * WHEN...Through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...slight overwash of water possible at the intersection of Highway 87 and Highway 124 and other lowest lying locations on the Bolivar Peninsula. Waves could runup close to parts of the Galveston Seawall, BlueWater Highway and Beach Drive in Surfside. In addition, with elevated seas in place, there will be a high risk up rip currents along all area beaches through the period.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Galveston Island; Matagorda Islands
